definition: surname Lan/abbr. for Lanzhou 蘭州|兰州[Lan2 zhou1], Gansu
orchid (蘭花|兰花 Cymbidium goeringii)/fragrant thoroughwort (蘭草|兰草 Eupatorium fortunei)/lily magnolia (木蘭|木兰)

sentences.english: The novel is set in Edinburgh and the Lothians at the time of the Napoleonic Wars.
sentences.chinese: 小说的场景设置在爱丁堡和拿破仑战争时期的锡兰。

sentences.english: Ceylon is an island at the south of India.
sentences.chinese: 锡兰是印度南边的一个岛。

sentences.english: On his return, he went to visit one of the little towns in the island of Zealand.
sentences.chinese: 他回到家中，到锡兰岛的一个小地方去访问。

sentences.english: The upland tea of Ceylon is made normally for broken form tea, show auburn.
sentences.chinese: 锡兰的高地茶通常制为碎形茶，呈赤褐色。

sentences.english: Wartsila Corporation - Clean Technology - Deals and Alliances Pr…
sentences.chinese: 芬兰瓦锡兰有限公司清洁技术分析报告。

sentences.english: It is designed by Wartsila Ship Design and classified by ABS.
sentences.chinese: 它的目的是瓦锡兰船舶设计和ABS的分类。

sentences.english: Sealand's turbulent history stands as a warning to nation-builders.
sentences.chinese: 锡兰异常曲折的历史对热衷于建国的人是一种警告。

sentences.english: The picture shows the unit's liaison officers being trained in Ceylon.
sentences.chinese: 图为该部队联络官在锡兰基地受训时合影。

sentences.english: Together, they toured Kalmunai as well as the devastated southern town of Galle.
sentences.chinese: 他们一起巡视了卡尔穆奈以及被毁坏的南部城市锡兰。

sentences.english: Some examples in Wartsila Co. are listed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 文中还列举了瓦锡兰公司在这方面的一些实例。

sentences.english: The graphite is mined in Ceylon.
The plantations of Ceylon tea occupy vast spaces as far as the eye beholds.
sentences.chinese: 视野所及的地方是满山遍野的锡兰茶树。

sentences.english: As Ceylon, it became independent in 1948.
I stayed with the governor when I was in Celon.
sentences.chinese: 我在锡兰时住在总督家里。

definition: Sumatra, one of the Indonesian islands
Khmer kingdom of Kampuchea or Cambodia/Chinese term for Cambodia from 7th to 15th century
Ming Dynasty name for modern day Malacca/see also 馬六甲|马六甲[Ma3 liu4 jia3]
Sudan/sultan (ruler of some Muslim states, esp. Ottoman Emperor)
Malacca or Melaka (town and state in Malaysia), also strait between Malaysia and Sumatra
variant of 蘇門答臘|苏门答腊[Su1 men2 da2 la4]
Borneo island (of Indonesia, Malaysia and Brunei)
